name: Puffy Madness
description:
PS: when playing the game, make sure you click Full Screen (  ), otherwise the game will be cropped

GMTK 2020 Game Jam - Submission Description

- Help these Puffs to stay safe, even if they'd  rather not be ...

- They randomly duplicate, making the balancing act get harder and harder 

- Each puff type has a mind of its own and will do things to upset your scales

- Small mistakes can set off huge chain reactions, where all you can do is watch and wait for the train wreck to complete its course

Controls

Click, Drag, and Drop to move Puffs around.

Use the Keys mentioned on the platforms to rotate them.
